name: RADE: The RADICALLY Authentic Dogfighting Experience
name_original: RADE: The RADICALLY Authentic Dogfighting Experience
description:
RADE: The RADICALLY Authentic Dogfighting ExperienceFlying around shooting things while trying to not be overwhelmed by this completely ridiculous GUI.

I'm pretty sure this is how it goes.

Controls

Mouse: Aim and maneuver

Left click: Fire

Right click (hold): Lock movement

Middle click: Bomb

If you want to compete with highscores, I threw together a quick version and put it up on Kongregate.
